停.definition: to stop; to halt; to park (a car)

停住.definition: to stop; to halt; to cease

停刊.definition: (of a newspaper, magazine etc) to stop publishing

停屍.definition: to keep the body of the deceased (until burial or cremation)

停工.definition: to stop work; to shut down; to stop production

停戰.definition: to cease fire; to stop fighting; armistice; truce

停損點.definition: see 止損點|止损点[zhi3 sun3 dian3]

停擺.definition: (of a pendulum) to stop swinging; (of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt; to be suspended; to be canceled; shutdown; (sports) lockout

停放.definition: to park (a car etc); to moor (a boat etc); to leave sth (in a place)

停服.definition: to shut down a server; (of a service) to terminate; to stop taking (a medicine)

停板制度.definition: system of circuit breakers; limit up, limit down system (finance)

停業.definition: to cease trading (temporarily or permanently); to close down

停機.definition: (of a machine) to stop; to shut down; to park a plane; to finish shooting (a TV program etc); to suspend a phone line; (of a prepaid mobile phone) to be out of credit

停機坪.definition: aircraft parking ground; apron; tarmac (at airport)

停止.definition: to stop; to halt; to cease

停步.definition: to come to a stand; to stop

停泊.definition: to anchor; anchorage; mooring (of a ship)

停滯.definition: stagnation; at a standstill; bogged down

停滯不前.definition: stuck and not moving forward (idiom); stagnant; in a rut; at a standstill

停用.definition: to stop using; to suspend; to discontinue; to disable

停留.definition: to stay somewhere temporarily; to stop over

停當.definition: settled; accomplished; ready; Taiwan pr. [ting2 dang4]

停經.definition: to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)

停航.definition: to stop running (of flight of shipping service); to suspend service (flight, sailing); to interrupt schedule

停課.definition: to stop classes; to close (of school)

停車.definition: to pull up (stop one's vehicle); to park; (of a machine) to stop working; to stall

停辦.definition: to shut down; to terminate; to cancel; to go out of business

停電.definition: to have a power failure; power cut

停靠.definition: to call at; to stop at; berth

停靠站.definition: bus or tram stop; intermediate stop (on route of ship, plane etc); port of call; stopover

停頓.definition: to halt; to break off; pause (in speech)

停食.definition: (of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)

停駛.definition: (of trains, buses or ferries etc) to stop running (temporarily or permanently)
